task.summary: Default task
Changing small things on the code of User module. Installing laravel-ide-helper.
Changing diff tool to Beyond Compare in workspace.
Adjusting merge tool parameters.

*- Correcting tracing mechanism using middleware, session vars and language files. *- Correcting SearchApi to make it standard for every object. *- Implementing Repository Pattern mechanism form Nomenclator and NomenclatorType objects. *- Implementing Nomenclator module activate functionality. *- Other modifications regarding resources and views.
Refactoring filter method in Customer and Nomenclator classes.

*- Creating CustomerRepository and refactoring CustomerController to use it. *- Making SearchApi more generic by asking if variables are set. *- Introducing static Helper class to extract methods form Controllers that don't do view processing.
* Refactoring Repository Pattern implementation.

* Refactoring Repository Pattern implementation. * Adding "sync" method to EloquentRepository to sync ManyToMany relationships. * Refactoring CustomerController to make it call new sync method from CustomerRepository.

Add helper, repositories and filters
A helper for DataTables is created to use throughout the application. The FirstName filter is added to the search API.
Correct datatable method to respect actions column
Save session filters in 'criterias' position
Set 'actions' column name at customers datatable
Save criterias in 'criterias' position at filters array
Correct php doc block for CutomerFormRequest class
Add new action to functional trace
Correct php doc block in NomenclatorFormRequest class
Add new operation to translation file
Create users module translation file
Modify project files
Add new route to permisssions
Add new route to users module

Improve users module
The edit view is created, alongside the change password functionality.
Update project files
